comments:

tomcat webapps directory - you get the following stack trace dump when 
restarting tomcat:

This is caused by generated web.xml containing multiple server definition and
mappings. Their orders are mixed.

This is obselete in the latest release since we remove the jsp pre-compile,
which generated web.xml dynamically.

traces.message: The content of element type "web-app"   must match "(icon?,display-name?,description?,distributable?,context-param*,servle  t*,servle t-mapping*,session-config?,mime-mapping*,welcome-file-list?,error-page*  ,taglib*, resource-ref*,security-constraint*,login-config?,security-role*,env-ent  ry*,ejb-r ef*)".
